Description: Detected a Generic API Key, potentially exposing access to various services and sensitive operations.
Author: mk
Message:
Move sources into package, fix imports, make scanner one-shot

- Move sources/ into src/interject/sources/ so adapters ship with
  the installed wheel
- Update all import paths (scanner, tests)
- Change interject-scan CLI to one-shot mode (run once, exit) for
  cron compatibility
- Add cron config file
- Add EXA_API_KEY to systemd service

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
